name: The Ritual for the Mysterious Godforce that Unites Us All
name_original: The Ritual for the Mysterious Godforce that Unites Us All
description:
PLEASE PARTICIPATE IN THIS IMPORTANT RITUAL. WITHOUT IT, YOU MAY NEVER ASCEND TO JOIN THE POLOOLOO IN THE ORIBAFT! EVERY PLAYER LEARNS A COMPLETELY DIFFERENT BOOSHKA TO UNDERSTAND THIS PLOOX. IN YOUR QUEST TO FIND THE SKLIDDO, YOU WILL LEARN EVERY VOORP IN THE BOOSHKA, AS IF YOU REALLY WERE HERE IN THE LAND OF THE UPAPAS YOURSELF.

This is the Global Game Jam 2016 build. Expect a polished build to drop in the future.

Our GGJ Entry can be found here.
